homepage.title: Promote and exploit public data for the benefit of all.

reuse_star.title: Data Exploration
reuse_star.description: The data.gouv.fr and the French Interministerial Digital Directorate (DINUM) teams offer open data explorations to facilitate their appropriation and reuse.
reuse_star.tagline: Discover some of these explorations below.

propose_reuse.title: Propose an exploration
propose_reuse.tagline: Do you have an idea for exploring public data that might be useful?

reuse.title: Community reuse
reuse.description: The strength of Open Data is its community. Discover our selection of data reuse carried out by other administrations, companies, associations or citizens.
